attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It wiped away all my photos and my phone data so now I have to restart and it tracked my location and made my phone glitch so it called the police

attributes.title: Never Again
attributes.review: So I could never understand why it takes 69 hours for this app to fully download!! Like it was a whole waste of my time! This app also wiped my phone as clean as Hilary Clinton’s criminal record. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!

attributes.title: SCAMMED ME
attributes.review: i downloaded this app back to try it again. i got a virus from it last time, this time it stole my credit card info!!!!! i got my bill and i saw so many donations from my bank account that were to the name of TRUMP PENCE. BEWARE OF THIS APP IT IS HORRIBLE

attributes.title: Terrible 🤬
attributes.review: This app wouldn’t stop sending me notifications about the Cheeto puff and when I tried to delete it it would just pop right up on my phone.😔🙌wth

attributes.title: TERRIBLE😍🧚❤️
attributes.review: I got this app couple days ago to buy some nonracial and non homophobic president merch jus to find out they’ve been HACKING all my data and taking it to the Chinese gov. Completely irrisbonsible and not okay. Plz shut this down k thx bye.

attributes.title: It’s horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible. It took 3 hours to download and I have perfect WiFi and never experienced ANYTHING like this. Then the app runs rlly slow and it’s glitchy so y’all need to fix y’all dusty as app

attributes.title: Keeps crashing
attributes.review: The app keeps crashing on me :/ it won’t even open. I should have looked at the ratings before installing this terrible app

attributes.title: Ruined my phone!!!
attributes.review: Such a useless and destructive app. It leaked my personal information, ruining my other social media! The app admins then tracked me by my location, found me, and threw my tortoise in the bath and laughed as he sank to the bottom. 😖😖😖❌❌❌

attributes.title: worst app ever made!
attributes.review: this app has made me want to smash my phone with a hammer. it took 4 hours to download and when i opened it my phone crashed. then, i got some crazy alert that my phone had been hacked by a man that looks like a cheeto. crazy stuff! do not download unless you want to risk this. i might have to get a new phone just to i can wipe the slate clean and never have downloaded this app.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD, HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: First, it took a WEEK to download and when I opened the app it crashed my phone😡😡. My phone had to get replaced TEN times because the app kept downloading on my phone and making it blow up. Thanks a lot 😤🤢🤢
